name: Contragage
description:
Opposites Attract... don't let that happen!

This game was made for Xanderjam  with the theme "Opposites Attract".

Contra: against, opposite, contrasting

Gage: valued object

Contragage is a game where you have to make sure the positive and negative charges don't collide with each other. It's that simple... or is it?

Controls:

Mouse click and drag

1 = freeze all charges on screen

2 = advance the countdown timer to shorten the level time

F = fullscreen/leave fullscreen

Backspace = exit game to title screen (all progress will be lost)

Difficulty increases gradually throughout the 20 levels. Use your assists (1 & 2) wisely. Check out the in-game tutorial for more info.
